articles.title: Watch Video: Team India celebrate Virat Kohli's birthday and Ravindra Jadeja's five-wicket haul - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: The winning Indian team celebrated Virat Kohli's birthday and Ravindra Jadeja's five-wicket haul after thumping win over South Africa
articles.content: The winning Indian team celebrated Virat Kohli’s birthday and Ravindra Jadeja’s five-wicket haul after thumping win over South Africa in the ICC World Cup 2023. Kohli, who turned 35 on November 5, sc… [+618 chars]
